backend/main.mo: Defines actor types and state for categories, products with image URLs, orders, user profiles, and garden centers, including access control and helper functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting OldProduct records to NewProduct by adding an imageUrls field and returning updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains a collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme, cart, and router providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI component showing an access-denied card with optional message and home navigation button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with state handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Protects routes by checking admin role, showing loaders or access denied when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Blocks access for unauthenticated users and displays a login prompt card.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireCust: Guards routes for customer role, showing loading or access denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireGard: Allows access only to garden center members or admins, otherwise shows loading or denied.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequirePlat: Route guard requiring platform admin privileges with loading and denial fallback.
Page layout wrapper with header, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/FooterSoc: Renders a set of social media links with icons in a compact footer widget.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Full footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and social link section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation, role-based portal links, and shopping cart badge.
Displays a numeric badge for total cart items when count is nonzero.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Product listing card showing image, name, description, price, and stock status.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminProduct: Provides mutations for adding products, toggling product active state, and initializing seed data, with query invalidation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useGardenCenter: Fetches products for a specified garden center for admin views using react-query.
Provides queries and mutations for managing garden centers and their members, including adding, removing, enabling, and disabling members.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's role and exposes a helper to check if the caller is a platform admin.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Fetches the authenticated user's profile with loading state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserRol: Checks if the authenticated caller is an admin via a simple boolean query.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Mutates and saves the caller's user profile and invalidates the related query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useCreateGard: Creates a garden center and invalidates role and garden center queries after success.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useGardenCent: Fetches, adds, updates, and toggles products for a specific garden center with appropriate query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useMyGardenCe: Fetches the garden center associated with the callerâ€™s primary membership.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useUpdateGard: Updates garden center details and invalidates related queries upon success.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Provides a placeholder query for fetching user orders, currently returning an empty list.
Places an order based on cart items and invalidates the orders query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useCategor: Fetches the list of product categories for storefront use.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useProduct: Fetches a single product by ID for product detail views.
Provides queries for active products, category-filtered products, and product search.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor instance based on user identity and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers. Wraps AuthClient creation and persists identities across reloads.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming, including light and dark mode palettes. Adds global typography and a custom container class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global CSS and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNurseriesP: Admin interface for managing garden centers, including member actions and nursery removal with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin UI for adding products, toggling product activation, and initializing seed data alongside listing active products.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart with quantity controls, item removal, totals, and a clear-cart action. Shows an empty-state message when the cart has no items.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows product listings with search, category filtering, and loading skeletons. Fetches categories and products, updating results based on user input.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders order summary and handles order placement, requiring user authentication. Redirects from empty carts and shows a profile setup dialog when needed.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the storefront home page with a hero section, feature highlights, and category previews. Loads categories and links users to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays a user's order history with status, product details, totals, and loading states, gated behind authentication.
frontend/src/pages/nursery/NurseryDashbo: Nursery dashboard for managing garden center details and adding or modifying nursery products with images.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows an order confirmation message and optional order ID, with links to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/portals/CustomerPorta: Redirects authenticated customers to the catalog or shows access denial for non-customer roles.
frontend/src/pages/portals/NurseryPortal: Nursery portal page that checks user role, redirects existing members, and provides a nursery registration form for new users.
frontend/src/pages/portals/TeamPortalPag: Team portal page that restricts access to platform admins and redirects authorized users to the admin nurseries view.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays detailed product info with images and allows adding the item to the cart.
frontend/src/store/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Provides cart context with add, update, remove, clear, and persistence logic using localStorage.
frontend/src/store/cart/cartStorage.ts: Handles loading, saving, and clearing cart data in localStorage with versioning and bigint support.
frontend/src/store/cart/types.ts: Type definitions for cart items, cart state, cart actions, and the combined cart context type.
frontend/src/store/cart/useCart.ts: Custom hook that exposes the cart context and enforces use within CartProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the GreenPlantz design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, requirements, architecture notes, and implemented features for the GreenPlantz platform.
